snippet.title: Like a Dragon Gaiden - Official Overview Trailer and Developer Update
snippet.description:
Join the director of Ryu Ga Gotoku Studio, Masayoshi Yokoyama, for a developer update on Like a Dragon Gaiden: The Man Who Erased His Name, and get a deep dive look at the upcoming game in this overview trailer. The trailer showcases more of the story, a breakdown of the two combat fighting styles Agent and Yakuza, various entertainment experiences like karaoke, and more. 

The video also reveals that a special trial version of Like a Dragon Infinite Wealth will be available in Like a Dragon Gaiden: The Man Who Erased His Name, and pre-order details regarding a Legendary Fighter Pack featuring Goro Majima and more as playable characters in Like a Dragon Gaiden's Coliseum battle arena.

Like a Dragon Gaiden: The Man Who Erased His Name will be available on PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, Xbox, and PC on November 9, 2023.
